snippet: Peter Salovey, a celebrated scholar of psychology who has for four years been Yale’s provost, will succeed Richard Levin, who is stepping down at the end of the academic year.
abstract: Yale University names celebrated psychology scholar Peter Salovey as its new president; Salovey, Yale's provost for the past four years, will succeed Richard Levin, who is stepping down at the end of the academic year after 20 years on the job.
lead_paragraph: Peter Salovey, a celebrated scholar of psychology who has for four years been Yale’s provost, will succeed Richard Levin, who is stepping down at the end of the academic year.

headline.seo: Yale Names Insider,  Peter Salovey, Its New President
headline.main: Yale’s Provost, Noted Psychology Scholar, Is Named President of the University
headline.print_headline: Yale’s Provost, Noted Psychology Scholar, Is Named President of the University
